title: Marsh Davies: 在SXSW音乐大会为我们投票！噢！来吧！
author: 六月奈
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Zero_Exact 于 2016-8-31 22:15 编辑 

Marsh Davies 发表于2016年8月31日
注：Marsh Davies 是工作于Mojang AB的创意社区经理。

The South by Southwest Conference, aka SXSW, is an amazing celebration of the convergence of interactive, film and music industries. It’s held in Austin, Texas each year, and is the height of all that is hip and cool. You know who else is hip and cool? We are. (You can tell by the way we use hip and cool phrases like “hip and cool”.)

美国德克萨斯州州府奥斯汀举办的音乐节，简称SXSW，是一个激动人心的聚集式互动的庆典，涉及到电影和音乐行业。它每年在德克萨斯州的奥斯汀举办，并且它是高端炫酷的巅峰，你知道什么是高端炫酷吗？我们就是（你可以从我们使用这个短语的方式来知道它是什么意思。）

We’d really like to go along to SXSW and tell people about our charity work with Block By Block, and our educational efforts with Minecraft: Education Edition. We’ve proposed a bunch of panels to present - and these are now up for a public vote. That means you can help us!

我们真的很想去SXSW并且逐一告诉人们关于我们的慈善工作，还有我们在教育方面的努力 —— Minecraft：教育版，我们已经建立了一些页面，现在这些都是为了一个公开的投票，这意味着你可以帮助我们！

If you fancy giving us a hand, head over to the SXSW community voting page, sign up, and give us a thumbs up on these two panels: “Minecraft in the Real World” and “Beyond STEM: Building Kids’ Creative Confidence”.  Hopefully we’ll see you at the conference in March next year!

如果你愿意帮我们一把，前往SXSW社区投票页面，登陆，然后在 “Minecraft in the Real World(现实世界的Minecraft)”和“Beyond STEM: Building Kids’ Creative Confidence(前端教育：建立起孩子们创造的信心)”这两个页面上为我们点赞！希望我们能在明年三月份的大会上与你相会！

Thanks! And cheerio!
谢谢！下次再见！

Marsh - @marshdavies

来源地址：http://www.mojang.com/2016/08/vote-for-us-at-sxsw-oh-go-on/

replies.author: zx728925
replies.txt_content: 我一脸懵逼，问自己：为什么不发？

其实我一直在纠结发不发...因为十分好奇他们为什么要跑音乐会上面去宣传...
